docs.lead_paragraph: Changes to the way autism is diagnosed may make it harder for many people who would no longer meet the criteria to get health, educational and social services, researchers say.

headline.seo: New Definition of Autism May Exclude Many, Study Suggests
headline.main: New Definition of Autism Will Exclude Many, Study Suggests
headline.print_headline: New Autism Rule Will Trim Many, A Study Suggests

docs.abstract: Proposed changes by the American Psychiatric Association that would narrow the criteria for autism would sharply reduce the rate at which the disorder is diagnosed and might make it harder for many people to get needed health, educational and social services.
docs.snippet: Changes to the way autism is diagnosed may make it harder for many people who would no longer meet the criteria to get health, educational and social services, researchers say.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Republican presidential candidates -- minus one, after Rick Perry dropped out earlier Thursday -- take the stage in Charleston, S.C., at 8 p.m. Eastern time Thursday for the final debate before Saturday's South Carolina primary.

docs.lead_paragraph: Eastman Kodak Files for Bankruptcy  |  Eastman Kodak said early Thursday that it had filed for bankruptcy protection, as the 131-year-old film pioneer struggled to adapt to an increasingly digital world.
The United Hospital Fund responds to a Sunday Review article, “Bargaining for a Child’s Love.”
docs.snippet: The United Hospital Fund responds to a Sunday Review article, “Bargaining for a Child’s Love.”

docs.lead_paragraph: New York City Opera cleared a major obstacle in its effort to forge ahead in reduced form and without its Lincoln Center home, saying on Wednesday that it had reached agreements with both of its major unions. Rehearsals were to begin immediately. The company and the unions have been trying to come up with a deal for almost a year in negotiations that grew bitter after the company announced it was leaving the David H. Koch Theater at Lincoln Center for various spots across the city. A strike, or even failure to reach an agreement before the Feb. 12 season start, could have put the fragile company under.

headline.main: City Opera Clears Hurdle In Union Negotiations
